mapper.sql: SELECT TA.OPTN_CAT_NO /* prOptnClssCd.prOptnClssCdListBase */ , TA.OPTN_CAT_REG_GB_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR018', TA.OPTN_CAT_REG_GB_CD) AS OPTN_CAT_REG_GB_CD_NM , TA.ENTR_NO , TB.ENTR_NM , TA.OPTN_CAT_TYP_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR019', TA.OPTN_CAT_TYP_CD) AS OPTN_CAT_TYP_CD_NM , TA.OPTN_CAT_NM , TA.SORT_SEQ , TA.USE_YN , TA.SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(TA.SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM , TA.SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(TA.SYS_REG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_REG_DTM FROM PR_OPTN_CLSS_CD TA LEFT JOIN ET_ENTR_BASE TB ON TA.ENTR_NO = TB.ENTR_NO WHERE TA.OPTN_CAT_TYP_CD LIKE #{condxOptnCatTypCd} || '%' AND TA.USE_YN LIKE #{condxUseYn} || '%'
mapper.select: SELECT OPTN_CAT_NO /* prOptnClssCd.getPrOptnClssCdListFromGoods */ , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR018', OPTN_CAT_REG_GB_CD) as OPTN_CAT_REG_GB_CD_NM , OPTN_CAT_NM , SORT_SEQ FROM PR_OPTN_CLSS_CD WHERE 1 = 1 AND ENTR_NO = #{entrNo} AND OPTN_CAT_REG_GB_CD = '02' AND USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT OPTN_CAT_NO , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR018', OPTN_CAT_REG_GB_CD) AS OPTN_CAT_REG_GB_CD_NM , OPTN_CAT_NM , SORT_SEQ FROM PR_OPTN_CLSS_CD WHERE 1 = 1 AND OPTN_CAT_REG_GB_CD = '01' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY SORT_SEQ
